location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Jodhpore [Jodhpur] to all Political Agents, Commissioner Ajmer, Commandants [Military] Corps

mods.abstract: Note enclosing a Demi-Official letter from Captain Evelyn Baring, private secretary to the Viceroy, to Colonel Brooke, Pelly's predecessor:Extract from a Demi-Official letter, dated 17 September 1872, regarding the submission of applications for promotion and preferment.
